sentences: Ma ei saa aru, mis puhul sa räägid.
Puhul, kui ta tuleb, helista mulle.
See on puhul, mida ma olen oodanud.
context: The Estonian word 'puhul' is often used to indicate a specific situation, case, or instance. It’s similar to the English ‘in the case of’, ‘with regard to’, or ‘as regards’. It can also mean 'respect' in certain contexts.
